alert.note: Alert for McCulloch; San Saba (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 4:19PM CDT until May 19 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern McCulloch County in west central Texas... Northwestern San Saba County in west central Texas... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 418 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Placid, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Placid around 425 PM CDT. Mercury around 435 PM CDT. Skeeterville and Elm Grove around 500 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Milburn, Us-190 Near The Mcculloch-San Saba County Line and Hall. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
